programme.title: Cops Reloaded
programme.desc: Officers stop a man on a bike who matches the description of a robbery suspect, the man runs until he falls and is arrested; three men are detained when found hanging out in a heavy drug alley; a boyfriend is arrested for pushing his girlfriend.

programme.title: Cops Reloaded
programme.desc: Officers find a man in someone else's home who is wanted for domestic violence restraining order and a burglary; a man tries to swallow a bag of weed as he is pulled over; a woman stabs another man in the arm with scissors and is arrested.

programme.title: Cops Reloaded
programme.desc: Police ask a man to step out of his car when they spot marijuana, when he does he runs and hides under a car and is held at gunpoint until he comes out; a female is detained for stabbing a man with scissors and drug possession.

programme.title: Cops Reloaded
programme.desc: Officers chase after a stolen vehicle until the operator clips the side of a taxi, wraps around a steel pole and is taken into custody; an undercover cop poses as a prostitute and arrests every man who is soliciting sex.

programme.title: Cops Reloaded
programme.desc: A man that has been arrested soliciting money is doing it again; a disturbance call is made when a father-in-law threatens a couple with knives because he thinks they stole his drugs.

programme.title: Cops Reloaded
programme.desc: A high speed chase ensues when cops go after a stolen truck; a daughter calls the cops on her father when he threatens to kill her because she was accusing him of cheating on her.

programme.title: Cops Reloaded
programme.desc: A high-speed chase starts when three suspects refuse to pull over; officers get a bank robbery call but heard the suspect left the building.

programme.title: Cops Reloaded
programme.desc: A homeless man is sleeping in a handicap parking spot but when officers arrive, he resists arrest; officers pull over a car for a traffic violation and find 700 ecstacy pills.

programme.title: Cops Reloaded

programme.title: Cops Reloaded
programme.desc: A truck chase ends when he pulls off the side of the road and runs through a field; a driver takes off on foot after a high-speed chase ends in a collision.

programme.desc: Officers search a man who they have just pulled over but he takes off on foot; officers find a man who just broke into a house very paranoid, on drugs, and claiming someone is out to kill his family and rape his daughter.

programme.desc: Officers see a vehicle hit a biker and immediately respond to the accident; a boyfriend assaults his girlfriend and her family and is taken into custody.

programme.title: Cops Reloaded
programme.desc: Cops chase after an automobile that ran a stop sign, the suspect eventually hits another car and is arrested for driving without a license and drug possession; a female is arrested when marijuana and cocaine are found in her car.

programme.title: Cops Reloaded
programme.desc: A man hits a pedestrian and runs but is caught, tasered, and faces many charges including resisting arrest, hit and run, and driving without a license; cops arrest a man for stealing a Porsche.

programme.desc: Cops pull over a motorcyclist who refuses to stop at a traffic signal; cops respond to a fight that breaks out in a near by parking lot.

programme.title: Cops Reloaded
programme.desc: Several armed men at a nearby home are arrested for assaulting people and attempting to run from cops; cops find a busted-in window of a car with a man in the front seat who claims its his car.

programme.title: Cops Reloaded
programme.desc: A man who is out on bond for grand theft auto is arrested again for trying to steal a car; two men are arrested for threatening a woman when she sees them beating up her neighbor.

programme.title: Cops Reloaded
programme.desc: Cops chase a car that just left a known drug house, but when the suspect is pulled over, he is arrested for felony of evasion and tampering with evidence; a K-9 unit finds cocaine under the passenger seat of a car and three suspects are arrested.
